mapper.select: SELECT k.ID AS keywordId, k.KEYWORD_TEXT AS keywordText, k.IS_ACTIVE AS keywordIsActive, r.ID AS recipientId, r.TWITTER_USER_ID AS recipientTwitterUserId, r.TWITTER_SCREEN_NAME AS recipientTwitterScreenName, r.IS_ACTIVE AS recipientIsActive, r.DESCRIPTION AS description FROM KEYWORDS k JOIN KEYWORD_RECIPIENT_MAP krm ON k.ID = krm.KEYWORD_ID JOIN RECIPIENTS r ON krm.RECIPIENT_ID = r.ID
SELECT ID AS keywordId, KEYWORD_TEXT AS keywordText, IS_ACTIVE AS keywordIsActive FROM KEYWORDS
SELECT ID AS recipientId, TWITTER_USER_ID AS recipientTwitterUserId, TWITTER_SCREEN_NAME AS recipientTwitterScreenName, IS_ACTIVE AS recipientIsActive, DESCRIPTION AS description FROM RECIPIENTS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPIENTS (TWITTER_USER_ID, TWITTER_SCREEN_NAME, DESCRIPTION, IS_ACTIVE) VALUES (#{twitterUserId}, #{twitterScreenName}, #{description}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE KEYWORDS SET KEYWORD_TEXT = #{keywordText}, IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}

UPDATE RECIPIENTS SET TWITTER_USER_ID = #{twitterUserId}, TWITTER_SCREEN_NAME = #{twitterScreenName}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive}, UPDATED_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM KEYWORD_RECIPIENT_MAP WHERE KEYWORD_ID = #{keywordId} AND RECIPIENT_ID = #{recipientId}
